<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4735</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Chronicle of the Centuries</string>
            <string language="es">Crónica de los siglos</string>
            <string language="ga">Croinic na nAoiseanna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chronik der Jahrhunderte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chronique des siècles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chronicle dos séculos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chronicle dei secoli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξιστορήστε κατά γράμμα των αιώνων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A research assignment, which focuses on the significance of events in the 20th Century for celebrating the Jubilee Year.</string>
            <string language="es">Un trabajo de investigación, que se centra en el significado de los sucesos del siglo XX para celebrar el año del jubileo.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tasc taighde, a dhíríonn ar thábhacht imeachtaí san Fhichiú hAois chun Bliain na hIubhaile a cheiliúradh.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Religious Education</string>
            <string language="es">Educación religiosa. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Oideachas Reiligiúnach</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Billeog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Forschung Anweisung, die auf die 
Stichhaltigkeit von Fällen im 20. Jahrhundert für das Feiern des 
Jubiläum-Jahres konzentriert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une affectation de recherches, qui se concentre 
sur la signification des événements au 20ème siècle pour 
célébrer l'année de jubilé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atribuição da pesquisa, que focalize no 
significado dos eventos no 20o século para comemorar o ano do 
jubilee.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'assegnazione di ricerca, che mette a fuoco 
sull'importanza degli eventi nel ventesimo secolo per la celebrazione 
dell'anno di giubileo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ερευνητική ανάθεση, η οποία εστιάζει στη σημασία 
των γεγονότων στο 20ό αιώνα για τον εορτασμό του έτους 
ιωβηλαίου.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religionserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation Religieuse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Religiosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Religiosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θρησκευτική εκπαίδευση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
